resources.string: Welcome to the CommCare Developer Toolkit! This application provides several utilities to aid you in successfully creating and using your own CommCare app. To get started, try out any of the utilities below.

Use the resizable bounding box below to get a feel for how your images will look at different sizes. To resize the box, click on the bottom right-hand corner and drag. When it looks about the size you want your image to appear, make note of the dimensions and resize your image file to match.
The dimensions you provided are either too small to show well on this screen, or represent an aspect ratio that does not show well on this screen.
Please enter a value for both dimensions

This utility is intended to improve the workflow for app-builders who are testing incremental changes to a form. Launching this action will trigger the following sequence of events in your app:

 - Save the current session, including any form entry progress
 - Attempt to automatically update to the latest build
 - If the update is successful, log out and log back in as the last user, and then restore the saved session
Follow a link below to view the download page for the app on the Google Play Store
This utility cannot be used on your device because it requires the Google Play Store to be available.
More utilities will be available soon! Check back for updates.

Some images in this app are graciously used under Creative Commons Licensing from thenounproject.com collection:

 - “Wrench” symbol by Aha Soft 
 - “Info” symbol by Gregor Črešnar 
 - “Image” symbol by Icons8
To register your device to receive push notifications, enter the username and password for your WEB user below.
